babel: Ŋʋn mali babil tumdi tuma lahabali
babel-desc: Zaŋ pahi #babel ka di tooi sɔŋ nam baabil tuun' tumda adaka yaɣili ka di tooi sɔŋ ka tɛmplɛɛti pahi
babel-autocreate-reason:
Otomatik nambu [[$1|Babel]] yaɣa paaji
1 more
Paramitanima ŋɔ pala bɛ ni zaŋ shɛli pahi:
babel-autocreate-text-levels: Ŋun mali tumdi tuma yaɣili wuhiya Ni bɛ mali baŋsim dubu kamani $1 zaŋ chaŋ zuliya $2.
babel-autocreate-text-main: Ban mali yaɣili tumdi ŋɔ nyɛla ban wuhi baŋsim yaɣ' shɛli baŋsim bɛ ni mali $1
babel-0: Lala ŋun su [[$1|no]] mali baŋsim kamani [[$2|$3]] (ban mali gbaau or bee ka ka yɛligɔla).
babel-1:
Ŋun mali ŋa tumdi tuma ŋɔ 
[[$1|basic]] mali baŋsim [[$2|$3]].
babel-2:
Ŋun mali ŋa tumdi tuma ŋɔ 
[[$1|basic]] mali baŋsim [[$2|$3]].
babel-3: Ŋun mali tumdi maalila [[$1 |advanced]] baŋsim zaŋ chaŋ [[$2|$3]]
babel-4: Ŋun mali tumdi ŋɔ [[$1|dii pala ŋun nya zuliya tɔɣisira]] baŋsim zaŋ kpa [[$2|$3]].
babel-5: Ŋun tumdi ŋɔ [[$1| nyɛla baŋda]] ŋun mali baŋsim [[$2|$3]].
babel-N: Ŋun su ŋɔ mali [[$1|nyɛla tiŋbia]] baŋda zaŋ chaŋ [[$2|$3]].
babel-0-n: Ŋun su ŋɔ maali [[$1|no]] baŋsim zaŋ chaŋ [[$2|Silimiinsili]] (bee m-baŋ li yaɣi ka muɣisigu shɛli kani).
babel-1-n: Ŋun mali tumdi ŋɔ nyɛla[[$1|basic]] baŋsim kamani [[$2|English]].
babel-2-n: Ŋun mali tumdi ŋɔ nyɛla [[$1|intermediate]] ŋun mali baŋsim [[$2|English]].
babel-3-n: Ŋun su tuma ŋɔ [[$1|advance]] baŋsim zaŋ jɛndi [[$2|English]].
babel-4-n: Ŋun su yaɣili ŋɔ [[$1|near native speaker]] baŋsim yaɣili of [[$2|English]].
babel-5-n: Ŋun mali ŋa tumdi [[$1|professional]] baŋsim kamani [[$2|English]].
babel-N-n: Ŋun mali yaɣili tumdi ŋɔ [[$1|native]] understanding of [[$2|English]].
